argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | drngmgp.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | drngmgp.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 3 |  | drngmgp.g | |- G = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s ( B \ { .0. } ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_isdrng2 | |- ( R e. DivRing <-> ( R e. Ring /\ G e. Grp ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simprbi | |- ( R e. DivRing -> G e. Grp ) |
